credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
title: Design for a Sedan Chair
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and red, green yellow and gray watercolor over graphite on heavy, textured cream laid paperboard
description: Three-quarter view of a sedan chair diminutively decorated with cartouches  containing bird and cupid, and circular medallions with chain-like swags. Tassels hang at corners of roof line and an urn draped with swags crowns the roof.
name: Drawing
